comments.text:
Created attachment 502139
testcase

1. Load the testcases
2. While the filepicker is visible, quit Firefox from the Mac OS X Dock.

Result: About 20% of the time,

###!!! ASSERTION: Don't call nsAppShell::Exit() from a modal event loop!: '!cocoaModal', file widget/src/cocoa/nsAppShell.mm, line 787
